fields_of_interest: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, European Neighbourhood Policy
head_office_address: Foundation for the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies (IHEID) Small Arms Survey 2, Ch.Eugène-Rigot
eu_initiatives:
EU firearms directive 
EU small arms strategy 
Project SAFTE (studying the acquisition of firearms by terrorists)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The Small Arms Survey is a global centre of excellence whose mandate is to generate evidence-based, impartial, and policy-relevant knowledge on all aspects of small arms and armed violence. It is the principal international source of expertise, information, and analysis on small arms and armed violence issues, and acts as a resource for governments, policy-makers, researchers, and civil society.
legal_status: Associated programme of the Graduate Institute of International and Development Studies in Geneva (itself a registered Swiss foundation)
